title: Hua Hin Sheraton Beachside Escape with All-Inclusive Dining, Daily Cocktails & Airport Transfers (Select Packages Only)
description:
Discover the essence of Thai tranquillity with a stay at the five-star Sheraton Hua Hin Resort & Spa on the sandy shores of Cha Am Beach. This tropical sanctuary offers a serene retreat with lush tropical gardens, expansive swimming pools and an onsite spa. There's alsofour restaurants and bars, each offering a different outlook and catering to your every craving. For an authentic Thai plates by the sea head to Luna Lanai, where intricate cocktails are complemented by fresh seafood; enjoy a more casual dining experience next to the lagoon pool at Salas Pool Restaurant, serving up wood-fired pizzas and homestyle Italian cooking; and for a romantic evening beneath the canopy of stars, request an intimate candlelit beach picnic in the sand.

This coastal retreat is the perfect base to discover heritage-rich Hua Hin village, the lively Cicada Night Markets, and an abundance of nearby high-end golf courses for enthusiastic players. Make the most of the resort's world-class facilities, including a pristine full-size tennis court and basketball court while the kids roam free in the StarClub. Treat the whole family to a splash in one of the many resort pools, some with kids’ slides, and find the perfect spot to watch the sunset, taking up residency in the lawn chairs or on the sandy beach.

title: Ultimate Five-Star Thai Holiday
description: From bustling Bangkok to five-star beachfront relaxation, this ultimate easy-to-plan Thai holiday takes you from city to beach in style with a two-night stopover at Westin Grande Sukhumvit Bangkok before six nights at Sheraton Hua Hin. Enjoy daily buffet breakfasts, all transfers, daily cocktails, a seven-course degustation dinner, five three-course dinners and six 30-minute massages for two adults.
location_description: Sheraton Hua Hin & Westin Bangkok - old*
offer_address: 1573 Petchkasem Road, Thambol Cha-Am, Hua Hin, Phetchaburi 76120, Thailand

title: City Break to Beachfront Bliss: The Ultimate Five-Star Sheraton Holiday
description: From bustling Bangkok to five-star beachfront relaxation, this ultimate easy-to-plan Thai holiday takes you from the city to the beach in style with a two-night stopover at Bangkok's Royal Orchid Sheraton Hotel & Towers followed by a stay at Sheraton Hua Hin Resort & Spa. Enjoy daily buffet breakfast, private transfers between the airport and both hotels, nightly cocktails, decadent dining experiences and 30-minute Thai massages.

vendor_name: Movenpick Asara Resort & Spa Hua Hin
title: City to Beachfront: Five-Star Escape with Daily Cocktails and Indulgent Dining
description: From an inner-city oasis in Thailand’s vibrant capital to five-star oceanfront relaxation, this ultimate easy-to-plan Thai holiday takes you from the city to the beach in style with a two-night city stay at Mövenpick BDMS Wellness Resort Bangkok followed by a stay at the award-winning Mövenpick Asara Resort & Spa Hua Hin. If you'd prefer to begin your holiday on the beach, that is no problem! Enjoy daily buffet breakfast, private transfers between the airport and both hotels, daily lunch or dinner plus a cocktail each in Hua Hin, and a 30-minute Thai massage each at Hua Hin’s sumptuous Asara Spa.
location_description: Mövenpick Resorts in Hua Hin & Bangkok 2019
offer_address: 53 Hua Hin 5 Alley Hua Hin, Hua Hin District, Prachuap Khiri Khan 77110, Thailand
